kun reading compounds: 笊【ざる】draining basket (traditionally made of bamboo), colander, strainer, sieve, something full of holes, zaru soba, strong drinker, someone who can drink like a fish
笊貝【ざるがい】Burchard's cockle (Vasticardium burchardi)
金ざる【きんざる】metal basket (for deep-frying, etc.), metallic basket
